message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
I appreciate your interest in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to go up to $925000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $925000, but I need to make a bit more to make it worth my while. I'm willing to sell it to you for $975000.
I understand your concerns, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at that price?
